mapper.select: SELECT ss.spike_id, ss.user_phone, ss.state, ss.create_time, s.spike_id "spike.spike_id", s.name "spike.name", s.number "spike.number", s.start_time "spike.start_time", s.end_time "spike.end_time", s.create_time "spike.create_time" FROM success_spike ss INNER JOIN spike s ON ss.spike_id=s.spike_id WHERE ss.spike_id=#{spikeId};
